actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to affirm the authority of the Congress to approve the design of currency.

summary.text: Currency Design Act - Amends the Federal Reserve Act to prohibit the Secretary of the Treasury from adopting any new form, tenor, or design of Federal reserve notes after January 1, 1984, unless such change has been authorized by law. Prohibits the Secretary from adopting any new design for coins unless it has been authorized by law. Prohibits the Secretary from minting any such new coin unless the design has been approved by the Commission of Fine Arts.

titles.title: A bill to affirm the authority of the Congress to approve the design of currency.
